page.title: 01NORTH EAST WORCESTER.
page.content: { Our area is North East Worcester.The housing is a mixture of council houses and private houses with a portion of shops and factories.We take up a bit of the city centre but we do not include the cathedral.Our area is largely built up but there are several open spaces.The open spaces are Perdiswell sports ground,Astwood cemetery, King Georges field,Pitchcroft Race Course,Leopard Hill Golf Course,Tolladine,a little bit of Northwick and Gheluvelt Park. There is the Worcester to Birmingham canal running through our area from the River Severn, North East.We have got several factories and trading estates.It is an area that has quite a few contrasts between old and new and between open spaces and built up areas.
